Title: 053: Career Transitioning to Data Science: Important Lessons from an Aspiring Data Scientist
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Aspiring Data Scientist Virginia Mendonca. You will know how Virginia goes about understanding what skills she needs to learn and how to break into the space of data science, what steps to take when building a new career in a different space, and also how goals and dreams are different and that how important your passion is to the success of your dreams.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/53
